prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
VIJAY A
QA Automation Test Engineer
Email Id : vijayantonya96@gmail.com
Contact No : +91 8123334296
OBJECTIVE
Driven and passionate QA Automation Engineer with a proven track record of over 5.6 years in
the IT field. Seeking a challenging role in Software Quality Assurance to utilize hands-on and
automation testing skills to contribute to the success of the organization.
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
 Having 5.6 years of industry experience in the area of Software Testing (Automation and
Manual) with a solid understanding of Test Planning, Test Design, Test Execution and Defect
Reporting & Tracking.
 Responsible for performing Functional Testing, Regression Testing, Integration Testing and
Smoke Testing in various Applications Domains.
 Hands on Experience in Automating Web Application Testing using Selenium Web Driver
with TestNG framework and BDD Cucumber.
 Strong Experience in Java Programming OOPS Concepts.
 Strong Experience on Different Concepts likes Takes Screenshot, JavaScript Executor, Robot
class, Pop-ups handling, Window handling, Alert handling.
 Strong Experience in Test Planning, Test Design, Test Execution and Defect Reporting &
Tracking.
 Strong experience in STLC and SDLC.
 Good exposure on testing and Bug Life Cycle.
 Good experience in Data driven Testing, Cross browser Testing and Parallel Test Execution
Testing using Selenium Web Driver, TestNG.
 Hands on experience in tracking and reporting of defects using Defect Tracking tool –
JIRA
 Strong Experience in cross browser and parallel testing web application.
 Maintaining the checkout and check in the source code from GIT.
 Experience in identifying object locators using CSS Selector for creating object
Repository
 Worked with Apache POI Library to read data from external source.
 Good Knowledge in REST assured for automation along with JSON parser validation and
Assertions.
 Knowledge over Structured Query Language (SQL) and JDBC Connection using Java.
 Well Knowledge in testing restful
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
